thread.title: Great stay
thread.title_full: Great stay - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Ealing, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DebbieOxfordshire
title: Great stay
text: This modern Holiday Inn Express was welcoming and comfortable. The requests I had made were noted and I had a quiet room with single beds. The design of the room was great and shower powerful with large towels available. Bed very comfortable. Great breakfast in calm bright area with magazines and papers. All staff excellent with attentive 'people ' skills. Would definitely stay again.
